issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
saw in create security group, probably the same in security group detail page and in tag editor. 

see attached screenshot
fields.summary: inbound rules extend outside their container when security group name in rule is super long

comments.body: [~jloza] Does the rule properly wrap if the group name has spaces?

[~kgill] not sure, I didn't test that. I would be OK with pushing this ticket, this is a corner case anyway. People are unlikely to name their groups super long names anyway. Feel free to target this one to 4.0.1.
[~kgill] [~jloza] The rule does not wrap even with the security group name contains spaces.
[~kyolee]: Pull request 1031 looks good to merge.  [~jloza]: Do you want to UX review the PR, or should I go ahead and merge it?
I'll take a little peek today and merge if it passes, thanks [~kgill]!

Excellent job, [~kyolee]! 

Needs implementing on security group landing page as well, please. It pushes the table outside the boundaries, and if there are lots of rules, will also push outside tiles, so please truncate for both views.

Thanks!

Pull request has been updated to add the ellipsis on the landing page as well:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1031
Thanks, [~kyolee]! It's still pushing the container a bit, can you truncate about 5 characters fewer? That should do it, even if they're narrow.
Updated the pull request to reduce the character limit to 15 on the landing page.
[~kyolee], I pulled again and see your commit, but the landing page still seems to be truncating at 30 char. Can you verify? I restarted my proxy just to be sure. No caching.
[~kyolee], I see the change, lemme try again.

Hey @kamal, can you take a look at this one? [~kyolee] seems to have pushed a fix for the security groups landing page, and I pulled the latest on his branch but on mine it's still truncating at 30 char. See attached screenshot. IDK. If it looks good to you, please code review. 

Note the weird alignment of the TH to the container as well.

Verified.  This is fixed.
{code}
